explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black and white striped top and black overalls is standing with his back to us in a brown hallway. To his left is a green railing, with yellow steps above and picture frames hanging on the wall. On the right is a little girl in a red short-sleeved shirt and blue skirt, facing right and holding a white object. Some spectators are sitting inside the metal railing on the right. In the distance, there are some people and some green trees.

[0-3] Then, a woman wearing a red vest, black and white shorts, glasses, and a backpack walks to the left. The man in the striped shirt turns right, revealing a white clown face. He puts his hands in front of him, crouches slightly, and sways, looking at the woman with the backpack before turning left again.
